name: MayIBeLightfromBillTonnisMinistries
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: may i be light
des: Bill Tonnis’ path is grounded in the Christian mystical tradition. He is a follower of the way of Jesus but embraces all religions that preach love as the way. Bill shares the unconditional love of God through his singing, speaking, writing, chaplaincy, spiritual care visits, jail ministry, and contemplative practice.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
